Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Graduate Research Supervisor Accreditation at Level 3
It is with great pleasure we confirm your Graduate Research Supervisor Accreditation at Level 3. Your accreditation certificate is attached for your records.
Ongoing Professional Development
There are a number of opportunities for experienced research supervisors to further develop and hone their supervisory skills. These professional development master classes and good practice workshops are facilitated by experienced research supervisors and relevant experts. They are available all year round.
Please visit the Research Supervision Accreditation Program Booking System to view the current list of offerings and to make a booking.
Resources for Research Supervisors
There are numerous resources for research supervisors wich you are welcome to access at any time.

Once again we'd like to congratulate you on your accreditation. If you would like to learn more about Monash graduate research supervisor accreditation and professional development, you can visit the website or contact us at MIGR-Membership@monash.edu.
